text: I woke up later than planned today and honestly didn’t feel guilty about it. Usually I rush out of bed trying to catch up with everything, but this morning I just sat there under the blanket for a bit, letting my brain catch up. The house was quiet, and the sunlight coming through the blinds made everything feel softer. I made breakfast—nothing fancy, just toast—and ate by the window while scrolling through my messages. It wasn’t an exciting morning, but for once, I didn’t feel like I was behind on everything. It was kind of nice.
title: Slow Start
